subject: Add voice system unit tests
description:
Create comprehensive test suite for voice system:
- New directory: `services/voiceNexus/__tests__/`
- Test files:
  - `complexityRouter.test.ts` - scoring algorithm, tier mapping, overrides
  - `knowledgeInjector.test.ts` - context formatting, API mocking
  - `orchestrator.test.ts` - mode switching, state management
- Mock all external providers (Claude, Gemini, ElevenLabs)
- Test edge cases: empty input, API failures, timeout handling
- Target: 80% coverage of voice system
